ParticleSystemManager Class Reference

This class is the main singleton of the particle system library for now, it simply holds references to expensive assets known to the C++ code and the relevant configuration strings for them. More...

#include <particle_system_manager.hpp>

Detailed Description

This class is the main singleton of the particle system library for now, it simply holds references to expensive assets known to the C++ code and the relevant configuration strings for them.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Constructor.

Member Function Documentation

void ParticleSystemManager::active ( bool  flag  )  [inline]

This is the Set-Accessor for the variable active.

Parameters:
flag The new value for active/inactive particle systems.

const bool ParticleSystemManager::active ( void   )  const [inline]

This is the Get-Accessor for the variable active.

If this is set to false, the particle systems are no longer updated or drawn. This effectively disables them.

Returns:
The flag indicating whether all particle systems are active or not.

void ParticleSystemManager::createUnmanagedObjects (  )  [virtual]

This method creates any resources that need to be recreated when our device is recreated.

Reimplemented from Moo::DeviceCallback.

void ParticleSystemManager::deleteUnmanagedObjects (  )  [virtual]

This method frees any resources that need to be recreated when our device is recreated.

Reimplemented from Moo::DeviceCallback.

bool ParticleSystemManager::doFini (  )  [protected, virtual]

This method finalises any objects that require finalises in the library, releasing resources.

Returns:
True if fini went on without errors, false otherwise.

void ParticleSystemManager::windVelocity ( const Vector3 &  newWindVelocity  )  [inline]

This is the Set-Accessor for the variable windVelocity.

All game systems have to update this on their update methods in order to keep every particle system updated on the wind velocity in the world.

Parameters:
newWindVelocity The current wind velocity for the frame.

const Vector3& ParticleSystemManager::windVelocity ( void   )  const [inline]

This is the Get-Accessor for the variable windVelocity.

This tells all particle systems what the current wind velocity is for the frame.

Returns:
Current wind velocity as a 3D vector.
